mapper.select: SELECT sr.id, sr.name, sr.description, sr.permission, sr.url, sr.menu_code FROM sys_resource sr WHERE sr.permission != 'anon'
SELECT sr.id, sr.name, sr.description, sr.permission, sr.url, sr.menu_code FROM sys_resource sr WHERE sr.permission = 'anon'

SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT sr.id, sr.name, sr.description, sr.permission, sr.url, sr.menu_code, srr.organization_id FROM sys_resource sr,sys_role_resource srr WHERE sr.id = srr.resource_id AND srr.type='r' AND sr.permission != 'anon' )t1, ( SELECT o2.id FROM sys_organization o1 LEFT JOIN sys_organization o2 ON o1.pid = o2.id WHERE o1.relation_id = #{0} )t2 WHERE t1.organization_id = t2.id

SELECT t1.* FROM ( SELECT sr.id, sr.name, sr.description, sr.permission, sr.url, sr.menu_code, srr.organization_id FROM sys_resource sr,sys_role_resource srr WHERE sr.id = srr.resource_id AND srr.type='r' AND sr.permission = 'anon' )t1, ( SELECT o2.id FROM sys_organization o1 LEFT JOIN sys_organization o2 ON o1.pid = o2.id WHERE o1.relation_id = #{0} )t2 WHERE t1.organization_id = t2.id
